title: Week 14 Waivers + Full Stream Ahead, Playoff Push - Fantasy Football Podcast for 12/7
description:
Week 14 Waiver Wire! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 14 waiver pickups and QB streamers! Plus, players to consider dropping, injury updates, and a new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for December 7th, 2021.
  
 (03:15) - Monday Night Recap: Patriots at Bills
 (08:20) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire
 (14:55) - NFL News
 (23:20) - Week 14 Waivers
 (25:05) - WR Waivers
 (32:50) - RB Waivers
 (41:00) - TE Waivers
 (44:15) - DST Streamers
 (46:10) - QB Streamers
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web

 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
